General.Name: Agung Semesta Sejahtera Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Agung Semesta Sejahtera Tbk primarily engages in the development of real estate properties in Indonesia. It develops apartment, residential, housing area, shophouse, and modern market projects. The company was formerly known as PT Sitara Propertindo Tbk and changed its name to PT Agung Semesta Sejahtera Tbk in August 2020. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia.
